title: PM strongly condemns terrorist attack on Police Station in Kurram
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday strongly condemned the terrorist attack on a police station in district Kurram in which a Frontier Constabulary personnel embraced martyrdom.
Paying tribute to the martyr, the prime minister expressed his heartfelt condolence to his family members.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to elevate the ranks of the departed soul in Jannah.
The prime minister also prayed for speedy recovery of those injured in the incident and directed that all possible medical assistance be provided to them.
He emphasized that such cowardice acts will not shake our resolve against terrorism, the prime minister said.
